item.title: Brian add a quote by Winston S. Churchill
item.description: "If you are going through hell, keep going." -- Winston S. Churchill

item.title: Brian add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Brian add a quote by William A. Petit
item.description: "...go forward with the inclination to live with a faith that embodies action, help a neighbor, fight for a cause, love your family." -- William A. Petit

item.title: Brian add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Is it so bad, then, to be misunderstood? Pythagoras was misunderstood, and Socrates, and Jesus, and Luther, and Copernicus, and Galileo, and Newton, and every pure and wise spirit that ever took flesh. To be great is to be misunderstood." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Brian add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Brian add a quote by E.F. Schumacher
item.description: "Any intelligent fool can make things bigger, more complex, and more violent. It takes a touch of genius â€” and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction." -- E.F. Schumacher

item.title: Brian add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have never let my schooling interfere with my education." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Brian add a quote by Gordon W. Allport
item.description: "So many tangles in life are ultimately hopeless that we have no appropriate sword other than laughter." -- Gordon W. Allport
